body_html:
Sorry for coming back to this so late - my brain is kinda melted today 🙈

You're right @mkalininait this could "theoretically" be merged, I don't see a problem. However and there you're right @branquinhoaa it indeed does not make too much sense when combined with the changes we agreed upon for #810 .

Therefore I'd rather close this one in order to not introduce code that's not tested (the Javascript code) and that we'll with 100% certainty want to get rid off within implementing the next issues anyways. Are you both fine with that?

Aside that @branquinhoaa you're approach for passing the _destroy is totally valid 👍 I'd have probably solved it differently and also for the sake of easier testability without feature specs would have preferred a way of doing it without Javascript, but that comes down to personal preference ✌️

body:
Sorry for coming back to this so late - my brain is kinda melted today 🙈 

You're right @mkalininait this could _"theoretically"_ be merged, I don't see a problem. However and there you're right @branquinhoaa it indeed does not make too much sense when combined with the changes we agreed upon for #810 .

Therefore I'd rather close this one in order to not introduce code that's not tested (the Javascript code) and that we'll with 100% certainty want to get rid off within implementing the next issues anyways. Are you both fine with that?

Aside that @branquinhoaa you're approach for passing the `_destroy` is totally valid 👍  I'd have probably solved it differently and also for the sake of easier testability without feature specs would have preferred a way of doing it _without_ Javascript, but that comes down to personal preference :v:
